title: FPS Drop
body: Recently I have been experiencing issues with FPS drops. Since this recent patch, my FPS has been dropping from the normal 130-140 range to around 30-60. This normally occurs post minion spawn and constantly when in lanes. I've supported a ticket on this issue. Thanks for your help in advance.

replies.body:
Since you have a ticket open already, those tech guys will most likely be able to help a lot more than I can here on the boards. While you're here though, let's go ahead and try a few steps to see if we can't get those frames smoothed out a bit.

Hit up our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) for some steps like updating drivers which should be able to help. If not, keep talking with those agents in your ticket and they'll be able to bump up those frames.

I talked to technical support, and they've kinda reduced the issue a bit. Although, the issue is still present. I'll try to finish it up with them before returning here. Thank you, Broporo! Have a pleasant day.
